document_data.name: Abyssal
document_data.mainbody: The '''abyssal language''' was the language of [[demons]].
document_data.History: It was a form of the [[Primordial language]] warped and twisted by the evil of the [[Abyss]].
document_data.Sound: Lower-ranking demons spoke using sounds like the barking of canines, while the speech of more refined demons sounded like softly droning ocean waves mingled with the violence of a swarm of angry hornets. As with everything involving the [[tanar'ri]], however, their speech was unpredictable, and sometimes an elite [[balor|balor's]] words were rougher or a lowly [[bar-lgura|bar-lgura's]] words smoother.
document_data.Script: Abyssal used the [[Infernal language|Infernal language's]] script or the [[Barazhad]] alphabet.
